== Ammasandra (612273) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Ammasandra is a village in the [[Turuvekere ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 154.87 hectares and harbouring 275 households with total population of 1026 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Turuvekere]] is at a distance of 17 km. Male population is 503 and female population is 523. Scheduled Caste Population is 18 and Scheduled Tribes population is 112. Census Location Code of the village is 612273<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
